openOnStartup.title: Open bookmarks bar on startup
openOnStartup.description: Bookmarks bar opens when opening a new tab

searchRunOnAnyKey.title: Start search on any key press
searchRunOnAnyKey.description: Start the search when any key is pressed, otherwise the search opens when you press the combination Ctrl+Q

tabName.title: Tab Title
tabName.description: Enter a title for your tab
